meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Desta Kimmel Ed Cardoni Matt Pressman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7099.

td.p: Desta Kimmel, a director of communications from Houston, Texas
Ed Cardoni, a director of a contemporary arts center from Buffalo, New York
Matt Pressman, a graduate student in history from Somerville, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,000)

tr.td: INDOOR & OUTDOOR CATS
THE WORKING DEAD
BIGGER THAN A BREADBOX
"V"OCABULARY
HUMAN BEHAVIOR
AFRICAN COUNTRY BY AIRPORT
(Alex: We'll give you the airport.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'After mating, the male of this big cat doesn\'t stay long with the female before he leaves for good, perhaps at 70 mph')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: After mating, the male of this big cat doesn't stay long with the female before he leaves for good, perhaps at 70 mph

tr.td: Matt
Ed
